course_description: Continuation of Theory and Analysis II. Topics include chromatic harmony, tonicization and modulation, contrapuntal techniques, variation, rondo and sonata forms, and linear chromaticism. Written work comprises analytical and composition assignments, and musicianship skills include ear training, keyboard theory, and improvisation.
